name: MILLION DREAMS FOUNDATION
briefDescription: WE ARE PRESENTLY FOCUSING ON CHILDREN EDUCATION AND WELFARE. WE MAJORLY AIM TO TRANSFORM THE EDUCATION ENVIRONMENT OF THE GOVT. AND LESS KNOWN PRIVATE SCHOOLS TO MAKE THEM A BETTER PLACE FOR EDUCATION AND LEARNING. LOOKING AHEAD, WE SEEK TO EXPAND OUR NETWORK, SHARE OUR EFFECTIVE PRACTICES AND ADVOCATE FOR QUALITY SCHOOL REFORM FOR CHILDREN ACROSS INDIA.➢	TO BUILD TOILETS, CLASSROOMS, WATER FACILITIES, ETC. IN SCHOOLS TO ENSURE THAT STUDENTS HAVE ACCESS TO A QUALITY LEARNING ENVIRONMENT.➢	WHERE USABLE CLASSROOMS EXIST, WE PROVIDE SOFT INFRASTRUCTURE LIKE FURNITURE, LIGHTING, WATER, INFRASTRUCTURE RE-MODELING PROPER SANITATION FACILITY ETC.
